carousel.title: Tokyo Tower at night
carousel.caption: A photo of Tokyo Tower I took during a night time walk with friends. The tower is located very close to were I lived in the Minato Ward!

carousel.title: Carbonara udon
carousel.caption: Insta-worthy carbonara udon I got with a friend in Harujuku. Looks better than it tasted.

carousel.title: Cat gallery in Shimokitazawa
carousel.caption: A cute cat gallery I found in Shimokitazawa!

carousel.title: Enoshima Mountain
carousel.caption: The view from Enoshima Mountain, a coastal town an hour out of Tokyo.

carousel.title: Jellyfish at Enoshima Aquarium
carousel.caption: Cute jellyfish I found at the Enoshima Aquarium! I wouldn't recommend going though (Japan has animal cruelty problems).

carousel.title: Group photo at Enoshima Aquarium
carousel.caption: A photo with my group that toured the Enoshima Aquarium! It was a great oppurtunity to practice my Japanese.

carousel.title: Ropeway in Kobe
carousel.caption: A photo of the ropeway I took during my trip to Kobe! Kobe is an area in the Kansai region of Japan, famous for it's marbled beef!
